raw_claims:
```json
{
    "claims": [
        {
            "claim_id": 1,
            "claim_text": "MindMap enables LLMs to comprehend KG inputs and infer with a combination of implicit and external knowledge.",
            "location": "Abstract",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "Our method enables LLMs to comprehend KG inputs and infer with a combination of implicit and external knowledge."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 2,
            "claim_text": "MindMap elicits the mind map of LLMs, revealing their reasoning pathways based on the ontology of knowledge.",
            "location": "Abstract",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "MindMap elicits the mind map of LLMs, which reveals their reasoning pathways based on the ontology of knowledge."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 3,
            "claim_text": "MindMap outperforms a series of prompting approaches by a large margin.",
            "location": "Experiments",
            "claim_type": "Results",
            "exact_quote": "This work underscores how LLM can learn to conduct synergistic inference with KG."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 4,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is robust to mismatched retrieval knowledge.",
            "location": "Experiments",
            "claim_type": "Results",
            "exact_quote": "MindMap is robust to mismatched retrieval knowledge."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 5,
            "claim_text": "MindMap achieves remarkable empirical gains over vanilla LLMs and retrieval-augmented generation methods.",
            "location": "Conclusion",
            "claim_type": "Results",
            "exact_quote": "Through extensive experiments on three question & answering datasets, we demonstrated that our approach, MindMap, achieves remarkable empirical gains over vanilla LLMs and retrieval-augmented generation methods."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 6,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is applicable to powerful pre-trained LLMs, such as commercial LLM-as-service APIs.",
            "location": "Method",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "By integrating both implicit and explicit knowledge, LLMs can achieve transparent and dependable inference, adapting to different levels of correctness in additional KG information."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 7,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is a plug-and-play prompting approach to elicit the graph-of-thoughts reasoning capability in LLMs.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "The goal of this work is to build a plug-and-play prompting approach to elicit the graph-of-thoughts reasoning capability in LLMs."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 8,
            "claim_text": "MindMap consolidates the retrieved facts from KGs and the implicit knowledge from LLMs.",
            "location": "Method",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "Specifically, MindMap sparks the graph of thoughts of LLMs that (1) consolidates the retrieved facts from KGs and the implicit knowledge from LLMs"
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 9,
            "claim_text": "MindMap discovers new patterns in input KGs.",
            "location": "Method",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "Specifically, MindMap sparks the graph of thoughts of LLMs that (2) discovers new patterns in input KGs"
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 10,
            "claim_text": "MindMap reasons over the mind map to yield final outputs.",
            "location": "Method",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "Specifically, MindMap sparks the graph of thoughts of LLMs that (3) reasons over the mind map to yield final outputs."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 11,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is a novel prompting pipeline that leverages knowledge graphs to enhance LLMs’ inference and transparency.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "we propose a novel prompting pipeline, named MindMap, that leverages knowledge graphs (KGs) to enhance LLMs’ inference and transparency."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 12,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is a novel approach to elicit the reasoning of LLMs on graph inputs.",
            "location": "Introduction",
            "claim_type": "Methodology",
            "exact_quote": "We call our method MindMap because it enables LLMs to comprehend graphical inputs to build their own mind map that supports evidence-grounded generation."
        },
        {
            "claim_id": 13,
            "claim_text": "MindMap is a plug-and-play approach to elicit the graph-of-thoughts reasoning capability in LLMs.",
            "location": "Introduction",
